entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:40 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:40 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:40 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
